verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kristesu prabhuni visvasulamuga Kadamuttincedamu i jivitayatra 2, Tanundu cotane manamundedamu 2, Idiye mana mahima niriksana 2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Tane margam, satyam jivamunu , Tana dvarane paradaisunu ceredamu 2, Paramunaku vellinadu mana sthalamu siddhaparaca, Ranaiyunnadu marala manala konipovutaku 2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Viduvadu manala anathalanuga neppudu , Manalo undi manato nivasincunu, Patintumu ajnalu premintumu tandrini, Prabhuvunu edurkona siddhamuga nundedam{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhurakada samayam samipincucunnadi, Proddugrunku velano artharatri velano, Tellavaru jamuno erugaru evvaru, Jagurukulamaiyundi melkoni prarthintumu (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhuvetencunu prabhavamuto mahimato, Megharudhudai vaccuta cucedamu (2), Tana pratyaksata apeksincu variki, Anugrahincunu nitikiritamu (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Enta goppa bhagyamu a parama nivasamu , Nityamaina mahimalo daiva sahavasamu (2), Velaleni krayamicci varasuluga jesitivi, Cellintumu prabhu krtajnatastotramulu (2){/lang-eng}
